name: Summer Solstice (Mokume Gane)
description:
Elegant and sophisticated! Hand-knotted Mokume Gane bracelet made with natural silk threads, handcrafted Mokume Gane beads and seamless clasp.

BRACELET SPECIFICATIONS:
Mokume Gane beads: 0.31 inches / 0.8 cm
Faceted gemstone: 0.10 inches / 2.5 mm, White Topaz
Weight: tba

PERSONALIZE THIS JEWELLERY!
Personalize this jewellery piece with your initials or the initials of your loved ones! Complementary hand-stamping up to two alphabets is available for this jewellery piece. Please click here for more information.

WHY MOKUME GANE?
The Mokume Gane provides a very unique and enigmatic organic detail and color blend that is not achievable with other metalsmithing techniques. Please click here to learn more about Mokume Gane.

WHO IS IT FOR?
I have designed this bracelet for the stylish women who desire fine and bold art jewellery. It is unique and classy, and is sure to impress.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:

The bracelet is made to order and will be entirely handcrafted by me. As no two Mokume Gane are the same, the Mokume Gane pattern may be slightly different unless stated otherwise.

The bracelet will normally be ready to be shipped in 2 to 3 weeks.





Please select your desired bracelet size below. Feel free to contact me if you would like a custom design bracelet, different bracelet size, or have any further inquiries. Thank you!

name: Perfect Everyday Bracelets (Set Of 4)
description:
Elegant and fashionable for everyday wear! Hand-knotted bracelets made with natural silk threads, genuine gemstone beads, and a handcrafted Mokume Gane clasp.

BRACELET SPECIFICATIONS:
Size of gemstone beads: 0.31 inches / 0.8 cm
Weight of each bracelet: 16 grams including approximately 4 grams of Sterling Silver

Natural semi-precious gemstones for the four bracelets: - Autumn Jasper - White Howlite - Pink Aventurine - Black Obsidian
PERSONALIZE THIS JEWELLERY!
Personalize this jewellery piece with your initials or the initials of your loved ones! Complementary hand-stamping up to two alphabets is available for this jewellery piece. Please click here for more information.

WHY MOKUME GANE?
The Mokume Gane provides a very unique and enigmatic organic detail and color blend that is not achievable with other metalsmithing techniques. Please click here to learn more about Mokume Gane.

WHO IS IT FOR?
I have designed this bracelet for the everyday stylish women. It is understated, classy, durable, and comfortable for everyday wear.

GIVING BACK
10% of the sales profit from each sale will be donated to The Breast Cancer Research Foundation. Please click here for more information on various charities and how we can give back. Charity receipts will be posted on my blog periodically.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:

The listing price is for a set of four bracelets of the same size. The bracelets are made to order and will be entirely handcrafted by me. As no two Mokume Gane are the same, the Mokume Gane pattern may be slightly different unless stated otherwise. Treat yourself to all colours or share it with your loved ones!

The bracelets will normally be ready to be shipped in 3 to 7 business days.





Please select your desired bracelet size below. Feel free to contact me if you would like a different size, different gemstones, or have any further inquiries. Thank you!

name: Watercolor Lily Bracelet (Flame-Painted)
description:
Unique, colorful, and fun for everyday wear! An entirely hand-fabricated flame-painted copper bracelet.

BRACELET SPECIFICATIONS:
Weight: 10 grams

HOW IS IT MADE?


PERSONALIZE THIS JEWELLERY!
Personalize this jewellery piece with your initials or the initials of your loved ones! Complementary hand-stamping up to two alphabets is available for all jewellery pieces that is above 100 CAD, or an order total (before shipping) that is above 100. Please click here for more information.

WHY FLAME-PAINTED COPPER?
The flame painting on Copper technique provides a natural and unique iridescent patina finish. The iridescent patina colors range from blues to greens to purples and pinks.

name: Silver Chestnut (Sterling Silver)
description:
A very chic statement piece! A perfect Mokume Gane sphere centerpiece on a Sterling Silver ring.

RING SPECIFICATIONS:
Dimensions: (H) tbacm x (W) tbacm x (D) tbacm
Weight: tba grams of Sterling Silver

PERSONALIZE THIS JEWELLERY!
Personalize this jewellery piece with your initials or the initials of your loved ones! Complementary hand-stamping up to two alphabets is available for this jewellery piece. Please click here for more information.

WHY MOKUME GANE?
The Mokume Gane provides a very unique and enigmatic organic detail and color blend that is not achievable with other metalsmithing techniques. Please click here to learn more about Mokume Gane.

WHO IS IT FOR?
I have designed the ring for anyone who enjoys expressions of minimalism, art, and slightly peculiar but elegant jewellery. It is chic, durable, and comfortable for everyday wear.

THE STORY BEHIND:
Inspired by the works of artists such as Robert Delaunay in the 1900s, my Modern Art jewellery line explores 3D forms and shapes in an abstract way. The first series explores spheres on circles (the ring). As both are perfectly round, they seem to exhibit different behaviors when seen from different angles.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:

The ring is made to order and will be entirely handcrafted by me. As no two Mokume Gane are the same, the Mokume Gane pattern may be slightly different unless stated otherwise.

The ring will normally be ready to be shipped in 3 to 7 business days.





Please select your desired ring size below. Feel free to contact me if you would like a custom design ring, different size, or have any further inquiries. Thank you!

name: The Perfect Stack (Set Of 5)
description:
Dainty and unique with big sparkles! Five stackable Sterling Silver rings with natural gemstones set in Mokume Gane bezels.

INDIVIDUAL RING SPECIFICATIONS:
Dimensions: (H) 2cm x (W) 2cm x (D) 0.5cm
Weight: 2 grams of Sterling Silver
Gemstone Size: 4mm

Natural semi-precious gemstones for the five rings: Faceted - White Topaz Faceted - Sky Blue Topaz Faceted - Red Garnet Faceted - Lemon Quartz Faceted - Green Peridot
HOW IS IT MADE?


WHY MOKUME GANE BEZEL?
The Mokume Gane bezel provides an organic wood grain detail that surrounds and enhances the sparkle from the gemstones. Please click here to learn more about Mokume Gane.

WHO IS IT FOR?
I have designed these rings for the everyday stylish women. They are understated, classy, durable, and comfortable for everyday wear.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:

The listing price is for a set of five rings of the same ring size. The rings are made to order and will be entirely handcrafted by me. As no two Mokume Gane are the same, the Mokume Gane pattern may be slightly different unless stated otherwise. Treat yourself to all colours or share it with your loved ones!

The rings will normally be ready to be shipped in 3 to 7 business days.





Please select your desired ring size below. Feel free to contact me if you would like a different size, different gemstone combinations, or have any further inquiries. Thank you!

name: Canopus Earrings (2-in-1)
description:
Versatile for day to night transition! A pair of Sterling Silver or 14K Gold gemstone studs, and removable dangling round gemstone details that can be worn with any other studs you own. All set in Mokume Gane bezel.

EARRINGS SPECIFICATIONS:
Length: 8 cm / 3 inches
Ear post thickness: 0.8 mm / 0.03 inches
Weight: 2 grams of Sterling Silver or 14K Gold
Gemstone Size: 4mm

PERSONALIZE THIS JEWELLERY!
Personalize this jewellery piece with your initials or the initials of your loved ones! Complementary hand-stamping up to two alphabets is available for this jewellery piece. Please click here for more information.

WHY MOKUME GANE BEZEL?
The Mokume Gane bezel provides an organic wood grain detail that surrounds and enhances the sparkle from the gemstones. Please click here to learn more about Mokume Gane.

WHAT IS 2-in-1 JEWELLERY?
Wear it as classic studs at the office, and put on the dangling gemstone details for a fabulous night look later! Try using the dangling gemstone details with any other studs you own to create new looks. Being so versatile, this pair of 2-in-1 earrings is a must have for any women.

WHO IS IT FOR?
I have designed these earrings for the everyday stylish women. It is understated, classy, durable, and comfortable for everyday wear.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:

The earrings are made to order and it will be entirely handcrafted by me. As no two Mokume Gane are the same, the Mokume Gane pattern may be slightly different unless stated otherwise.

The earrings will normally be ready to be shipped in 3 to 7 business days.





Please select your desired precious metal type and gemstones below. Feel free to contact me if you would like a custom design pair of earrings, different gemstone combinations, a different dangling length, or have any further inquiries. Thank you!
